zh: 信驊科技收購 Broadcom 旗下 Emulex Pilot™ BMC 晶片事業
伺服器遠端管理晶片(BMC)大廠信驊科技 ASPEED Technology Inc. 擬以總價3千萬美元，收購 Broadcom 旗下的 Emulex Pilot™伺服器遠端管理晶片事業 (Emulex Pilot™ Business)相關資產，其中 11,386,192 美元將以現金支付，其餘則以 2,022,000 股信驊科技新普通股交付。交易條件、時間及其他重要約定，將依照交易合約執行。

信驊科技董事長林鴻明表示：「Emulex Pilot™ 的伺服器遠端管理晶片在品牌市場上具有很高的接受度，並擁有一批經驗豐富的SOC軟硬體設計及服務專業人才，其現有主要客戶包括英特爾、思科、富士通、NEC、EMC、Oracle 等等。經由此一收購所取得之關鍵專利及其他智慧財產，將大幅提升信驊科技在伺服器遠端管理晶片的整體專利布局及技術廣度，對未來伺服器雲端市場及品牌市場的維持及擴大將有相當的助益。此一收購案並將補足信驊科技目前人才、技術、產品與客戶組合的缺口，創造未來更大的成長空間。雙方將進一步形成長期策略關係，藉此透過更深更廣的技術合作提升產品競爭力，並提供更創新的產品以利於開拓新市場。」
Broadcom 領導 Emulex Pilot™ 事業團隊的資深協理 Dwarka Partani 表示：「很高興能夠與頂尖伺服器遠端管理SOC系統解決方案創始者信驊科技合作，我們期待將來能夠持續開發 Pilot™ 產品線，為客戶提供更有價值的解決方案，並協助信驊科技提升其在伺服器市場之競爭力。」
展望未來，收購完成後，透過取得相關專利技術，信驊科技將持續研發創新，以更深更廣的產品組合與技術能力，提供客戶完整的解決方案與服務，進一步提升企業價值。

信驊科技為一家卓越的 Fabless 無晶圓廠 IC 設計公司，本公司為市場頂尖 SOC 系統解決方案的領導者與創始者，專注於高毛利之利基型市場，並致力於研發創新與差異化之產品。其研發領域涵蓋：伺服器管理晶片、PC /AV 影音延伸、桌面虛擬化(VDI)解決方案。本公司成立於 2004 年，2014 年及 2015 年均榮獲富比士雜誌(Forbes)評選為亞太地區 200 大最佳中小企業 (Asia's 200 Best Under a Billion)。ASPEED 總部位於台灣新竹科學工業園區，欲了解更多訊息，請參訪ASPEED官方網站：www.ASPEEDTECH.com。
新聞聯絡人信驊科技股份有限公司吳俐俐/E-mail：lili_wu@aspeedtech.com
en: ASPEED to Acquire Emulex Pilot™ Business from Broadcom

May 12th, 2016, Hsinchu, Taiwan – ASPEED Technology Inc., the world’s leading Remote Server Management SoC provider, today announced that it will acquire Broadcom’s Emulex Pilot™ Business at a total purchase price of US$30 million, out of which US$11,386,192 will be paid in cash and the remaining will be paid in ASPEED’s common shares.  Other terms and conditions are referred to in the relevant agreements.

“Broadcom’s Emulex Pilot™ series Remote Server Management chip is widely acclaimed in the market.  It has provided server customers such as Intel, Cisco, Fujitsu, NEC, EMC and Oracle with comprehensive solutions satisfying customer demand for many years and is backed by an experienced management and R&D team with numerous key patents and other IP rights.  We believe this deal will strengthen ASPEED’s product portfolio, customer base and further enhance ASPEED competitiveness in the fast-changing and ever-competitive server market,” said Mr. Chris Lin, ASPEED Chairman & CEO. “This acquisition is the beginning of a long-term strategic relationship between Broadcom and ASPEED, which is expected to include technical cooperation to provide a broader range of innovative solutions and new market opportunities for both companies.”

“We are excited to be joining forces with ASPEED, an innovator of cutting-edge Server Management SOC systems solutions,” Broadcom’s Emulex Pilot™ Senior Director Dwarka Partani said. “We look forward to continuing to develop our Emulex Pilot™ product line to provide valuable solutions to our customers and to assist ASPEED in further enhancing its competiveness in the server market.”

Moving forward, through the acquisition of the Emulex Pilot team, ASPEED will continue its research and development activities and innovate in the US, strive to broaden its product portfolio, provide customers with more innovative and complete product solutions and increase corporate value.

ASPEED Technology Inc. is a highly innovative fabless IC-design company founded in Nov. 2004, Hsinchu Science Park, Taiwan. With the focus on niche-market, ASPEED is an innovator of cutting-edge SoC system solutions, which include Server Management SoC solution, PC/AV extension solution, and Desktop Virtualization. ASPEED Technology has been honored as one of “Forbes Asia's 200 Best Under a Billion” companies in 2014 and 2015, and received many awards, such as Computex Best Choice Award.  For more detailed information, please visit ASPEED website at http://www.aspeedtech.com/
